1008360.name: final m00n - Defender of the Cubes The Soundtrack
1008360.description:
This soundtrack was produced specifically for the individual m00ns, and their respective uniqueness and the special atmosphere on it.


It was important to us to combine three things in the songs for this game:
  • It should be a tribute to the music of the old days of arcade shooters.
  • The compositions should not sound the way music sounds today. Rather, how like music could sounds in over a million years in the future.
  • The mood of the time of the UFO-Classics (and sightings of flying saucers) of the 60s, 70s & 80s should be included.
After a time-consuming search in the recording studio for the right instruments, we decided to use Output's virtual instruments. These sounds made us feel like composing music for a game, so apocalyptic and as far as no game ever in the future.
The individual tracks were composed in the Artist Tonstudio. The complete experience you get in this DLC ...


Bonus Tracks:
16. Main Theme Remixed (4:39″)
17. Now It Starts (5:48″)
1008360.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
